alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:14PM CDT until August 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henderson County in west Tennessee... McNairy County in west Tennessee... Western Hardin County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Chester County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Selmer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Henderson, Selmer, Pickwick Landing State Park, Adamsville, Sardis, Pickwick Dam, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Jacks Creek, Montgomery, McNairy, Crump, Scotts Hill, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Ramer, Saltillo and Finger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
